attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That the underlying principle of democracy is equality and truth. That all people are led from darkness to light untruth to truth. 
Therefore politicians should never lie to the public in a democratic state. Lieing to the public by any state employee including the P.M. office should be treated as a crime against the people and should be treated as bearing false witness and the politicians sent to prison, No matter who or what the motivation.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
